snippet.title: Distraction Machine-Official Trailer
snippet.description: Welcome to Island City, infested with flesh-eating feeders! You are The Distractor, Warrior Bard and Pied Piper of the undead. With loops and and array of 'cyclepunk' instruments made from bike parts,fulfill requests by NPCs to lull a child to sleep, hype feeder fighter up for battle and more! Follow criteria such as instrument or music style and play back your creation to see if you helped....or harmed!You can soothe the living, but It's said a skilled Distractor can even control the undead. Follow your own rhythm, but will your music save your people, or lead them to ruin?
